Summary: 2 lights changing to 9 lights then back to 2 lights.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Evant
There were no other sightings in Evant on or around February 5th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home from a basketball game at the gym by myself, near the town square, when I noticed two very, very, bright orange lights seemingly dancing in the sky to the north of town toward hamilton. At first I thought they were military flares or helicopters with search lights, but then I noticed that the lights would disappear, and then reappear a fairly long distance away in an instant, and then just stop. Then as I watched in amazement, the two lights broke apart into about nine different lights that were moving erratically with no pattern, and without seeming to go anywhere. I called a friend to look in that direction from his house, but he lives about ten miles away and couldn't see anything from where he lives. I felt amazed and tried to take pictures with my phone, but the streetlights distorted the view in the camera. I was kind of freaking out and ran to my house to get my dad to come outside to look so that nobody would think I was crazy. They were gone by the time he came outside.
